description: This source file defines a LinkedList class implemented in Kotlin. It includes methods to add, remove, get size, retrieve elements by index, and manages its internal nodes through a nested Node class.

classes.name: LinkedList
classes.description: A singly linked list implementation with methods to add, remove, access size, and get elements by index.

classes.name: Node
classes.description: A nested class representing a node in the linked list, holding data and a reference to the next node.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new element to the end of the linked list.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes the first occurrence of the specified element from the list.

methods.name: size
methods.description: Returns the number of elements in the list.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves the element at the specified index.

methods.name: unlink
methods.description: Removes a node from the list, updating references accordingly.

methods.name: tail
methods.description: Finds and returns the last node in the list.
